title: How to build Fiora
body:
{{item:3153}} (or {{item:3074}}) {{item:3111}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3035}} and then pick one: {{item:3072}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3026}} 

The amount of times you can spam Q and E with this build is enough to make going tanky worth it. You get more of a damage output by staying alive than you do by going full glass cannon. She feels simliar to Irelia tbh. 

Edit: 

> [{quoted}](name=AIaya,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=LITg0BYe,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-09T02:45:23.157+0000)
>
> I've been going {{item:1001}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3072}} .

Another decent build^

Pretty much go offtank or be useless. 

Edit 2: 

> [{quoted}](name=3ternalkarma,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=LITg0BYe,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-08-09T05:40:51.396+0000)
>
> {{item:3153}} {{item:1330}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3143}} ? idk i honestly feel building her bruiser is best now ortherwise she never survives fights

Like I said any offtank build will work really, people have their preferences. But she is a DPS bruiser now. I think she is actually pretty strong, even though others may disagree.
